analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ niyyānikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham niyyānikam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na niyyānikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha pe avigate cha

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ aniyyānikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham aniyyānikam dhammam paccayā na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na aniyyānikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
